update.description:
GZ_PLUGIN_VISIBLE is now always defined, regardless of the BUILDING_STATIC_LIBS
flag. Plugins always have to be dll's, so this makes sure they are.
This also uses GZ_PLUGIN_VISIBLE on the macros, so the RegisterPlugin function
is exported correctly

As mentioned in Issue 800, The .dll ending hack will be fixed in a less hacky way in the near future. For now though this will suffice.
update.title: Ensure plugin and plugin-macros are always exported
